commit message: Abstract away xkcd-specifics from ComicInfo object.
Rename 'Hover text' in strings to 'Alt text' in case we add providers for comics with non-hover commentary.
Implement xkcd comic provider, and use it in XkcdViewerActivity.
Completely generalize XkcdViewerActivity into ComicViewerActivity. Subclass XkcdViewerActivity specifies provider.
Generalize ArchiveActivity, and subclass it for xkcd.
Remove generic parts, use ComicViewer library.
Bump up version number. Update copyright dates.
Put back display of xkcd archive the way it was before id was removed from ArchiveItem.toString.

Stop HttpURLConnection handling redirects, breaking the random button.
Fixes gh-64.

Provide link data on ComicInfo (these are larger image versions of the
comic).
